summary:
Craigslist is a popular website for online classified ads. It was started by Craig Newmark in 1995 as an email list for local events in San Francisco. The site now has sections for jobs, housing, sales, services, and more.

It expanded to other U.S. and Canadian cities in 2000 and now covers 70 countries. Despite its global reach, most visitors are from the U.S. Craigslist is one of the top 20 most visited websites worldwide.
title: Craigslist
